passives.effects: Damaging [[basic attack]]s, [[champion ability|abilities]], [[Named item effect|item effects]], and [[summoner spell]]s, as well as the application of {{tip|crowd control}} and [[damage over time]] effects, generate [[stack]]s against enemy champions, up to one per attack or cast per champion. Applying 2 stacks to a champion within a 2 second period deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to them equal to {{as|{{rd|6%|4%}} of target's '''maximum''' health}} and grants you a {{tip|shield}} for {{rd|160|80}} {{as|(+ {{rd|40%|20%}} '''bonus''' AD)}} for 2 seconds.
passives.name: Ever Rising Moon
